scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.dev:setup: npm run dev:init && npm run dev:seed
scripts.dev:reset: npm run build && node dist/src/scripts/cleanup.js reset && npm run dev:seed
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run azurite:start" "npm run watch" "func start --verbose"
scripts.dev:win: concurrently "npm run azurite:start" "npm run watch" "func start --verbose"
